mapper.select: select VehicleId as VehId, GpsTime, Longitude as longitude, Latitude as latitude, Velocity as Speed from HistoryLocation where 1=1 and GpsTime >= #{beginTime} and GpsTime <= #{endTime} and VehicleId = #{vehId} ORDER BY GpsTime
SELECT a.id, a.userid, a.cph, a.Deviceid, a.platecolor, a.vehtype, b.khqc AS company FROM Vehicle a INNER JOIN Client b ON a.userid = b.id WHERE b.khqc = #{company}
SELECT TOP 1 id AS vehid, cph, platecolor FROM Vehicle WHERE cph = #{cph} AND platecolor =#{color}

select * from ( SELECT Longitude, Latitude, begintime, endtime, vehid, velocity speed, cph, platecolor, CONCAT ( ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 86400 ) ), '天', ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 3600 ) % 24 ), '时', ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 60 ) % 60 ), '分', ( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) % 60 ), '秒' ) AS timesShow, datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) AS times FROM ( SELECT a.*, ( SELECT MIN (TIME) FROM dyndata WHERE vehid = #{vehid} AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 AND Latitude = a.Latitude AND Longitude = a.Longitude ) begintime, ( SELECT MAX (TIME) FROM dyndata WHERE vehid = #{vehid} AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 AND Latitude = a.Latitude AND Longitude = a.Longitude ) endtime FROM ( SELECT velocity, vehicle.id vehid, Longitude, Latitude, cph, platecolor FROM dyndata, vehicle WHERE vehicle.id = dyndata.vehid and vehid = #{vehid} AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 GROUP BY Longitude, Latitude, vehicle.id, velocity, cph, platecolor ) a ) a WHERE datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) >= 600 ) a where 1=1
ORDER BY begintime

select *from ( SELECT Longitude, Latitude, begintime, endtime, vehid, velocity speed, cph, platecolor, CONCAT ( ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 86400 ) ), '天', ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 3600 ) % 24 ), '时', ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 60 ) % 60 ), '分', ( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) % 60 ), '秒' ) AS timesShow, datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) AS times FROM ( SELECT a.*, ( SELECT MIN (TIME) FROM dyndata WHERE vehid = a.vehid AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 AND Latitude = a.Latitude AND Longitude = a.Longitude ) begintime, ( SELECT MAX (TIME) FROM dyndata WHERE vehid = a.vehid AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 AND Latitude = a.Latitude AND Longitude = a.Longitude ) endtime FROM ( SELECT velocity, vehicle.id vehid, Longitude, Latitude, cph, platecolor FROM dyndata, vehicle WHERE vehicle.id = dyndata.vehid AND vehid IN ( SELECT id FROM Vehicle WHERE userid = ( SELECT id FROM Client WHERE khqc = #{company} ) ) AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 GROUP BY Longitude, Latitude, vehicle.id, velocity, cph, platecolor ) a ) a WHERE datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) >= 600 ) aa where 1=1
ORDER BY vehid, begintime

select cph,vehid from (SELECT Longitude, Latitude, begintime, endtime, vehid, platecolor, cph, CONVERT (VARCHAR(100), begintime, 23) tonjishijian, CONCAT ( ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 86400 ) ), '天', ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 3600 ) % 24 ), '时', ( floor( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) / 60 ) % 60 ), '分', ( datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) % 60 ), '秒' ) AS tingcheshijian, datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) AS times FROM ( SELECT a.*, ( SELECT MIN (TIME) FROM dyndata WHERE vehid = a.vehid AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 AND Latitude = a.Latitude AND Longitude = a.Longitude ) begintime, ( SELECT MAX (TIME) FROM dyndata WHERE vehid = a.vehid AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 AND Latitude = a.Latitude AND Longitude = a.Longitude ) endtime FROM ( SELECT vehicle.id vehid, Longitude, Latitude, platecolor, cph FROM dyndata, vehicle WHERE vehicle.id = dyndata.vehid AND vehid in( select id from Vehicle where userid=( select id from Client where khqc=#{company}
) ) AND TIME >= #{begintime} AND TIME <= #{endtime} AND velocity = 0 GROUP BY Longitude, Latitude, vehicle.id, platecolor, cph ) a ) a WHERE datediff(SECOND, begintime, endtime) >= 600 ) a GROUP BY cph,vehid

SELECT distinct t.vehid as id, v.cph as title, c.id as parentId, CASE WHEN t.systime < dateadd(Minute,-10,GETDATE()) then 0 else 1 end AS isonline FROM tpvehdata t inner join vehicle v on t.VehId=v.id inner join client c on v.userid = c.id and c.khqc = #{company}
select DISTINCT ATTACHCODE,FILE_NAME as fileName,FILE_SAVE_NAME as fileSaveName,FLODER from SA_ATTACHFILES where isnull(FLODER,'') != '' and isnull(ATTACHCODE,'') != '' and FLODER = #{FLODER}
select top 70 FLODER from SA_ATTACHFILES where isnull(FLODER,'') != '' and isnull(ATTACHCODE,'') != '' GROUP BY FLODER order by FLODER
select top 80 FLODER from SA_ATTACHFILES where isnull(FLODER,'') != '' and isnull(ATTACHCODE,'') != '' GROUP BY FLODER order by FLODER desc
select dp_id as dpId,dp_name as dpName from sys_departments
